title: Fight 2 Win Gaming Recruiting Plat/Diamond players LF Mid/Jungle/Top
body:
Fight 2 Win Gaming is looking for Plat/Diamond Jungle/Top/Mid in order to complete our team and win some tournaments with. Currently all roles are open to tryouts and practice will start 7-8pm EST depending on what times work with people.

you MUST be able to communicate and not rage. We are a team to win but we are also looking for a good team environment.

Application:

IGN:
rank:
age:
role:
top 5 champs:
why do you want to join our team?
Can you make practice every weekday at 7-8pm EST for practice?
Op.gg link? (Recommended):

Current Roster:

Top: Open
Middle: Open
Jungle: Open
ADC: closed
Support: closed

replies.body:
IGN: hypnoslime (have a smurf called Hypercarrysmurf)
rank: p5 
age: 16
role: jungle
top 5 champs: Master Yi, Wukong, J4, Udyr, Shyvana
why do you want to join our team? I want to join a competitive team that is open to constructive feedback, ive carried 3 of my friend to gold with my smurf in 15 days in summer (Akril, StingerMS and X sura X), been in and won tumorous tournaments, watch professional streamers such as wingsofdeath and bjergston purely for self improvement both mechanically and mentally and can dictate the pace of the game by shot calling, i do not rage and can communicate well.
Can you make practice every weekday at 7-8pm EST for practice? yes
Op.gg link? (Recommended): na.op.gg/summoner/userName=hypnoslime

IGN:  KoolaidOath (playing on a smurf to grind out IP, I'll add you on PVPGodlike)
rank: D5 on main
age: 16
role: Jungle
top 5 champs: Lee,Kha,Udyr,Vi,Fiddle
why do you want to join our team? I want to be in a competitive environment again. I've played on several tournament teams and would love to compete.
Can you make practice every weekday at 7-8pm EST for practice? Yes
Op.gg link? (Recommended): http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=KoolaidOath
LF Top and Jungler right now.
